contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City | official_name = Quismondo, Spain | nickname = | image_flag = sin_bandera.svg| image_seal = sin_escudo.svg| image_map = | map_caption = | subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] | subdivision_name = [[Spain]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Autonomous communities of Spain|Autonomous community]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Castile-La Mancha]] | subdivision_type2 = [[Provinces of Spain|Province]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Toledo (province)|Toledo]] | subdivision_type3 = [[List of municipalities in Toledo|Municipality]] | subdivision_name3 = Quismondo | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_magnitude = | area_total_km2 = 47 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_m = 548 | population_as_of = 2006 | population_note = | population_total = 1533 | population_density_km2 = 32.6 | timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] | utc_offset_DST = +2 | latitude = | longitude = | website = | footnotes = | }} '''Quismondo''' is a municipality located in the [[Toledo (province)|province of Toledo]], [[Castile-La Mancha]], [[Spain]]. According to the 2006 [[census]] ([[Instituto Nacional de EstadÃ­stica (Spain)|INE]]), the municipality has a population of 1533 inhabitants. {{Municipalities in Toledo}} {{CastileLaMancha-geo-stub}} {{coord|40|06|N|4|19|W|display=title|region:ES_type:city_source:GNS-enwiki}} [[Category:Municipalities in the Province of Toledo]]
